alert.note: Alert for Hooker; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hooker, northeastern McPherson and southwestern Thomas Counties through 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/... At 1010 PM CDT/910 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Swan Lake to Tryon. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River, East Cody Lake, Weir and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 166 and 173. Highway 97 between mile markers 33 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
